channel.title: I can't get this server to run
channel.description:
Im on Mac OSX When I try to run, on terminal I get [code]cd /Users/PatrickCarroll/Downloads/PVP\ 317\ X\ Source localhost:PVP 317 X Source PatrickCarroll$ java -Xmx1024M server
Online. npc.cfg: file not found. npcdrops.cfg: file not found. autospawn.cfg: file not found. item.cfg: file not found. globaldrops.cfg: file not found. doors.cfg: file not found. shops.cfg: file not found. [/code]

item.title: I can't get this server to run
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

I don’t know anything about Mac, but I had the same problem when I ran my server on Linux for the first time. I really cant think of a decent way to word this, so: the codes that load each file are written to work on windows, you would have to change them to work on Mac.

For example:

Should be written as:

item.title: I can't get this server to run
item.dc:creator: @PlucScape PlucScape
item.description:
@PlucScape wrote:

[quote=“patrickcarroll12233, post:1, topic:384882”]Im on Mac OSX
When I try to run, on terminal I get

[code]cd /Users/PatrickCarroll/Downloads/PVP\ 317\ X\ Source
localhost:PVP 317 X Source PatrickCarroll$ java -Xmx1024M server

Online.
npc.cfg: file not found.
npcdrops.cfg: file not found.
autospawn.cfg: file not found.
item.cfg: file not found.
globaldrops.cfg: file not found.
doors.cfg: file not found.
shops.cfg: file not found.
[/code][/quote]
You have to claim your cookie on resolving your own problem.
Your errors on running:

npc.cfg: file not found.
npcdrops.cfg: file not found.
autospawn.cfg: file not found.
item.cfg: file not found.
globaldrops.cfg: file not found.
doors.cfg: file not found.
shops.cfg: file not found.

You can’t play if you don’t have these files, that’s all there is to it.

Read full topic
